CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 很快；迅速；立即；即刻；稍后；一会儿；不久；马上；早日；及早；较早；早些时候；宁愿；宁可

synonym.mean: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指恰恰就在此刻，一秒钟也没耽误。
主要用于美国英语，语气稍弱于at once，强调动作迅速。
常用词，指行动快，完成速度快。
口语中常用，语气强烈，指时间紧迫，一刻也不能耽误。
和soon同义，指动作发生或完成的速度之快。
指做完一件事后，立即就做另一件事，中间一般没有明显的时间间隔。

word_group.brief_definition: 很快再见, 一会见, 回见
傻瓜口袋漏, 有钱留不住；蠢人不积财
word_group.phrase: a fool and his money are soon parted

word_group.brief_definition: 即将推出；即将上映；即将上市
很快好；很快康复；早点康复

list.abstract: Soon,英语单词。adv.快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿；

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you all very much. More soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常感谢大家。很快会有更多消息。

yingyinNormal.en: Soon. It just never seemed like the right time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快，只是时机一直不对。

yingyinNormal.en: Pretty soon you're all going to join the work force.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快你们就会参加工作。

yingyinNormal.en: He's going to make his play soon, though. Today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他应该很快实施他的计划，在今天。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm waiting for a friend. He should be here soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在这等个朋友，他应该很快就到了。

yingyinNormal.en: I will be returning to Gusteau's soon, hungry for more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很快会再度光临食神餐厅，满足我的口腹之欲。

yingyinNormal.en: Soon, real soon. Come on. I wanna show you something else. Come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快，很快就可以了，来吧，我想给你看点别的，跟我来。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, and just think. Soon there'll be lots of little Bings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想想，很快地就会出现很多小宾。

yingyinNormal.en: As I say, Hanna Schmitz is coming up for release very soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如我信中所说汉娜·施密茨很快就要刑满释放了。

yingyinNormal.en: Soon he'll be able to call you, that lady he knew who got fired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快的，他就可以叫你“那个被开除的女人”。

yingyinNormal.en: So you will kill this woman to save my life? It will all be over very soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要杀这个女人来救我？很快就会结束的。

yingyinNormal.en: As you will no doubt soon discover, not everyone agrees with our methods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快你就会发现，不是所有人都同意我们的方案。

yingyinNormal.en: Ok, but get the potatoes in the oven, the others will be here soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，但是把土豆放到烤箱里吧，其他人很快就会到了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure that will happen soon enough. But in the meantime, I still want oatmeal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个愿望很快就能实现了，但我还是要燕麦粥。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, ha. I've found our little hill. We'll soon be home. Hooray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊，哈。我已经找到我们的小山了。我们很快就会到家了。好棒！

yingyinNormal.en: Should we be expecting him anytime soon? Not as long as the cigars and brandy hold out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他会很快回来吗? 只要还有烟酒，就不会。

yingyinNormal.en: Careful, I saw this on Star Trek. Smoke's gonna come out of his ears soon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小心点，我在《星际迷航》看过这幕。很快他耳朵要冒出蒸汽了。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry. It'll be over soon and we can go get a treat. I'm thinking ice cream.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心。很快就弄好了之后给你买好吃的，冰激凌怎么样。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: I'm getting ready to retire soon. Retirement means reinventing yourself in many ways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很快就准备退休了。退休意味着各个方面重塑你自身。

yingyinNormal.en: Eggs? I can't see any eggs? Not now, but there will be eggs soon. Woooo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下蛋？可是我什么东西都没有看到呀？还没有呢，但是很快就会有了。噢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 很快; 马上; 不久; 即将

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: without delay; in a prompt way
sense_info_list.zh: 很快; 马上; 不久; 即将

examination_example.sentence: Everybody wants to know how the people who will <highlight>soon</highlight> inhabit those empty office cubicles will differ from those who came before them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都想知道，即将 居住在那些空办公室隔间的人与之前的人有何不同。

examination_example.sentence: But many middle-class occupations — trucking, financial advice, software engineering — have aroused their interest, or <highlight>soon</highlight> will.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但许多中产阶级职业——卡车运输、金融咨询、软件工程——已经或即将引起他们的兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Soon</highlight> after his father's release from prison, Dickens got a better job as errand boy in law offices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲出狱后不久，狄更斯找到了一份更好的差事，在律师事务所当跑腿的。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual time; in a short time

examination_example.sentence: Facebook promised that it would not link phone numbers to Facebook identities, but it broke the promise almost as <highlight>soon</highlight> as the deal went through.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脸书承诺不会将电话号码与脸书身份联系起来，但几乎交易一完成，它就违背了这一承诺。

sense_info_list.en: in agreement with one's choice or preference

word_usage.usage:
soon可表示“宁可; 宁愿”，常用would just as soon do sth.和would sooner do sth. (than sth.)表示“宁愿……而不愿……”。
示例：She'd sooner share a house with other students than live at home with her parents. 
她宁愿和其他学生合住，也不愿和父母住在家里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: without delay; in a prompt way

examination_example.sentence: Burberry's change of marketing strategy to make products available as <highlight>soon</highlight> as consumers see them on the catwalk didn't achieve the expected effect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴宝莉改变营销策略，让消费者在时装秀上一看到产品就可以买到，但这并没有达到预期的效果。

word_usage.usage:
当表示“将要多久”时，要用how soon，不可用how long。
示例：他要多久才来?
误 How long is he coming?
正 How soon is he coming?

as soon as引导的状语从句中的谓语动词，只能用现在时来表示将来的时间。
示例：我一有空就会再写的。
误 I will write again as soon as I will be free.
正 I will write again as soon as I am free.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: without delay; in a prompt way

examination_example.sentence: It may <highlight>soon</highlight> replace the traditional economic model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能很快会取代传统的经济模式。

examination_example.sentence: Why did Donna Barr say they wouldn't see the plan carried out any time <highlight>soon</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么唐娜·巴尔说他们短期内不会看到计划实施?

examination_example.sentence: High schools in Portland, Chicago, and elsewhere have either implemented or will <highlight>soon</highlight> introduce ethnic studies classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 波特兰、芝加哥和其他地方的高中已经实施或将很快引入种族研究课程。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual time; in a short time

examination_example.sentence: Correct their mistake as <highlight>soon</highlight> as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽快改正他们的错误。

examination_example.sentence: We will arrange to return the pets to them as <highlight>soon</highlight> as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会尽快安排将宠物送还他们。

examination_example.sentence: They are already on California roads, so it is not too <highlight>soon</highlight> to ask whether we can program a machine to act ethically.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们已经出现在加利福尼亚州的道路上，所以现在问我们是否可以对机器进行编程，让它们以道德的方式行事还不算太早。

word_usage.usage:
as soon as引导的状语从句中的谓语动词，只能用现在时来表示将来的时间。
示例：我一有空就会再写的。
误 I will write again as soon as I will be free.
正 I will write again as soon as I am free.

当表示“将要多久”时，要用how soon，不可用how long。
示例：他要多久才来?
误 How long is he coming?
正 How soon is he coming?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: without delay; in a prompt way

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>soon</highlight> discover that much has changed since the days of disturbing reports of camps among tons of rubbish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很快发现，自从几天来不断有令人不安的报道说难民营里堆满了垃圾以来，情况已经发生了很大的变化。

examination_example.sentence: They said they would make a decision <highlight>soon</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们表示很快就会做出决定。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>soon</highlight> realized that the silence was not unpleasant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很快意识到这种沉默并没有令人不快。

word_usage.usage:
soon通常放在句末或放在主要动词前，或放在句首：
I finished the work sooner than I expected.
我完成这项工作比预料的要早。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adv. 不久；很快；宁可；宁愿；快；早

examination_example.sentence: I must get well <highlight>soon</highlight> because I will have tests on science and geography next week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须尽快好起来，因为下周我有科学考试和地理考试。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Soon</highlight>, his airplane was ready to fly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很快，他的飞机准备起飞了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Soon</highlight>, the project received a lot of attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很快，这个项目就得到了很多关注。

examination_example.sentence: Wuhan was locked down as <highlight>soon</highlight> as the novel coronavirus broke out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新型冠状病毒爆发后，武汉立即被封城。

examination_example.sentence: Mike started cooking as <highlight>soon</highlight> as he got home from school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迈克一放学回家就开始做饭。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>soon</highlight> as we arrived, we got to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一到就开始工作。

examination_example.sentence: They remember every corner of the city, and dispatch emergency medical workers to the right place as <highlight>soon</highlight> as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们记住城市的每一个角落，并尽快派遣急救医务人员到准确的地方。

examination_example.sentence: He said he would try to find a job as <highlight>soon</highlight> as possible to support himself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说他会尽快找一份工作来养活自己。

examination_example.sentence: I'll send an ambulance (救护车) as <highlight>soon</highlight> as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会尽快派一辆救护车过去。

word_usage.usage:
当表示“将要多久”时，要用how soon，不可用how long。
示例：他要多久才来?
误 How long is he coming?
正 How soon is he coming?

as soon as引导的状语从句中的谓语动词，只能用现在时来表示将来的时间。
示例：我一有空就会再写的。
误 I will write again as soon as I will be free.
正 I will write again as soon as I am free.
